summary: Changes Bethesda intro to a modified one
descriptionHtml:
Hello.

This mod modifies default Bethesda intro video.

How to install.

In order to install this mod You will have to open Your Video folder wich is located in 
Skyrim\\Data\\Video           I assume You know where Skyrim folder is located.
Now that You opened it You need to place there \"BGS_Logo.bik\" and \"BGS_Logo.bik.backup\" files 
wich will lead to replacing your default \"BGS_Logo.bik\" with mine,
 so when You will be asked if you want to replace it, just answer yes.
(If You wish You can sureley create Your own \"BGS_Logo.bik\" backup file from Your default 
\"BGS_Logo.bik\" instead of using mine or save a copy of it somewere else on Your computer, just in case.)
Now You will see a modified Bethesda intro video when You launch Skyrim.

How to uninstall.

If fore some reason something goes wrong or You do not like this intro and want to get
 back to the original one, You can just rename my \"BGS_Logo.bik.backup\" file to \"BGS_Logo.bik\"
 or use Your own backup file to set things right.

Goodbye.
author: 6150RE
